mapper.sql: id, parent_id AS parentId, type, href, icon, name, description, order_num AS orderNum, created_time AS createdTime, updated_time AS updatedTime, created_by AS createdBy, updated_by AS updatedBy
mapper.select: select m.name, m.type, m.id, m.href, m.icon, m.order_num from menus m left join roles_menus_relation rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join users_roles_relation ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join users u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.id = #{userId}
